Create_Modification_Error_Page.heading: You can't create a new modification

Label_Texts.create_modification_hint_label: You can't currently create a new modification as you already have one in draft. You can only have one modification with the status 'In draft' at a time. You'll need to either submit or delete your 'In draft' modification before creating another.If you also have a modification that is currently with sponsor or review body, you'll need to wait until a final outcome has been issued before you can submit another.
